TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Create and update Organisation or Unit with CommentText.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the operational elements (defined by IDT Schema Documentation > IESUnits.xsd > CombatEngineerUnit, as an example Unit or Organisation, it might be any other) and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it. Focused on the Unit's CommentText Metadata element.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for an Organisation or Unit with at least a CommentText Metadata element, along with all its mandatory Elements. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the unit is created and all elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates an example Unit or Organisation with name XXX_CT_049 and fills ALL its mandatory elements with values, as well as its CommentText Metadata Element.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the unit: ITA_CT_049
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the example Unit or Organisation created and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer updates the previous example Unit or Organisation with HostilityStatusCode 'Suspect' and writes a generic comment (using long_txt with at least 25 characters) about the event in the CommentText Metadata Element. Keeping the former values for the rest of elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process the example Unit or Organisation and all elements that the Producer updated.
